ml.alternet.security.auth

Interface CredentialsChecker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Credentials.Checker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CredentialsChecker.$

    public interface CredentialsChecker
extends Credentials.Checker
    Allow to check credentials regarding a list of candidates crypt formats.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CredentialsChecker.$
      Default implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean check(Credentials credentials, String crypt)
      Check some credentials with a given crypt, regarding the list of candidates crypt formats that was set.
      List<CryptFormat> getCryptFormats()
      Return the set of candidate crypt formats to use.
      void reportError(String message, String crypt, Exception e)
      Report an error, typically when a bad parameter was set to the hasher, or when no suitable hasher were found for a given crypt.
      default void setCryptFormats(CryptFormat... formats)
      Set the list of candidate crypt formats to use for getting the suitable hasher.
      void setCryptFormats(List<CryptFormat> formats)
      Set the list of candidate crypt formats to use for getting the suitable hasher.
      default void setCryptFormats(String... cryptFormatClasses)
      Set the list of candidate crypt formats to use for getting the suitable hasher.

    • Method Detail

      • check

        default boolean check(Credentials credentials,
                      String crypt)
        Check some credentials with a given crypt, regarding the list of candidates crypt formats that was set.
        Specified by:
        check in interface Credentials.Checker
        Parameters:
        credentials - The credentials to check.
        crypt - The crypt to compare with.
        Returns:
        true when the credentials matches the crypt, false otherwise. When false is returned, an error may have been reported.
        See Also:
        reportError(String, String, Exception)

      • reportError

        void reportError(String message,
                 String crypt,
                 Exception e)
        Report an error, typically when a bad parameter was set to the hasher, or when no suitable hasher were found for a given crypt.
        Specified by:
        reportError in interface Credentials.Checker
        Parameters:
        message - The error message.
        crypt - The crypt to check.
        e - The exception, may be null

      • getCryptFormats

        List<CryptFormat> getCryptFormats()
        Return the set of candidate crypt formats to use.
        Returns:
        The set of candidate crypt formats to use.

      • setCryptFormats

        void setCryptFormats(List<CryptFormat> formats)
        Set the list of candidate crypt formats to use for getting the suitable hasher.
        Parameters:
        formats - The list of candidate crypt formats.

      • setCryptFormats

        default void setCryptFormats(CryptFormat... formats)
        Set the list of candidate crypt formats to use for getting the suitable hasher.
        Parameters:
        formats - The list of candidate crypt formats.

      • setCryptFormats

        default void setCryptFormats(String... cryptFormatClasses)
        Set the list of candidate crypt formats to use for getting the suitable hasher.
        Parameters:
        cryptFormatClasses - The list of candidate crypt formats class names.
